summary: This is an internal FBI email forwarding a news article link from The Hill regarding New York prosecutors requesting to speak with Prince Andrew as part of the Jeffrey Epstein investigation. The email shows the FBI monitoring media coverage of the case.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Mentioned as the individual whom prosecutors in New York have asked to speak with regarding the Epstein case.

events.title: Prosecutors Request Interview with Prince Andrew
events.description: Prosecutors in New York ask to speak with Prince Andrew in connection with the Jeffrey Epstein investigation, as reported by The Hill.

keyFacts: As of June 8, 2020, prosecutors in New York were seeking to interview Prince Andrew regarding the Jeffrey Epstein case.
The FBI was actively monitoring media reports about the investigation, as shown by this internal email forwarding a news link.
The source of the information is a news article from The Hill, indicating the request was public knowledge at the time.
